scripts.dev:kill: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "$ErrorActionPreference='SilentlyContinue'; Get-Process electron -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Stop-Process -Force; Get-Process node -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Where-Object { $_.Path -like '*vite*' -or $_.Path -like '*tsup*' } | Stop-Process -Force; if (Get-Command Get-NetTCPConnection -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue) { foreach ($p in 5173,5174) { Get-NetTCPConnection -LocalPort $p -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | ForEach-Object { Stop-Process -Id $_.OwningProcess -Force } } } ; exit 0"
scripts.dev:all: npm run dev:kill && concurrently -n main,renderer,electron -c blue,green,magenta "npm:dev:main" "npm:dev:renderer" "npm:dev:electron"
scripts.build: npm run build:main && npm run build:renderer
